text: @EddieZipperer @AOC Lies! All Lies AOC. It’s terribly sad that you tweeted this. This is not true calling it Wuhan Flu or whatever isn’t racist. Racism? Please I know it’s the Dem calling card when they are losing the narrative but sad AOC & embarrassing
